name: Marley's Collie
description: Marley's Collie is an indica-dominant hybrid bred by Sensi Seeds that won the Dutch High Life Cup in 1999. These sticky, spiky buds offer a pungent sweet aroma with musky Afghan undertones, delivering effects that are strong in both physical and cerebral sensation. Indoor and outdoor grows can expect flowers between 60 and 65 days.
attributes_title: Focused, Aroused, Hungry, Tingly, Relaxed, Lack of Appetite, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Dizzy, Dry Mouth, Paranoid, Anxious
